comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Daughter of Mrs. John K. Shields, wife of the Senator fron Tennessee, see The Washington times., August 05, 1919, FINAL EDITION, Page 10,, with photo. She was engaged to Clement C. Heth (according to The Washington times., August 14, 1919, FINAL EDITION, Page 11,, col. 5, "To Wed in Tennessee"). She was a debutante in 1916, The Washington herald., February 27, 1916, Page 4, col. 4. reported a dinner at the Army and Navy Club in honor of her and Miss Grace Overman. Grace Overman:

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: According to www.sadiesparks.com/wmswepson.htm she was born ca. 1897 in Knox Co., Tenn. and died on Dec 28, 1963 in Blacksburg, Montgomery Co, Va. She married her husband Clement Craig Heth on Sept. 10,1919.
